attributes.action: Publish a simple guide to the Regulation of Investigatory Powers Act for both citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: and Councils; in particular pointing out that the rise in RIPA authorisations by Councils is largely due to their obtaining authorisations for activities that are not covered; that Councils have a duty to enforce serious criminal laws including fraud, trademarks and other legislation with up to 10 years imprisonment; that local authorities have had enforcement responsibilities since the time of the Saxon Kings; and that many activities that are being complained about were routinely carried out by Councils before RIPA but without the necessity of having them authorised and recorded.
